recipe.title: Belgian Endive and Apple Salad with Cranberry Vinaigrette
ingredients: 2 tablespoons frozen cranberry juice concentrate, thawed
3 heads Belgian endive, thinly sliced crosswise
2 Red Delicious or Fuji apples, unpeeled, cored, chopped
instructions: Whisk oil, cranberry juice concentrate and vinegar in small bowl to blend. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Combine endive and apples in medium bowl. Pour dressing over; toss to coat. Sprinkle cranberries, green onions and walnuts over and serve.
